reviewText: Grandson and I really like the series, I hope there is more to come.

if you are looking for A well thought out well produced storyline and narration this series is not it. The animation and artistry are there but it just is not as polished as something like Monsters Inc or Nemo. I wish I could recommend better.

all three dvd under the title Dragon Hunter are great.... l  love them

i sent many children dvd's to my grandson joshua so i thank your concern

to get items i ordered to him in Texas as soon as possible...  even i

am a dragon fan and your whole staff has contributed to a wonderful christmas and new years for both me and my grandson...

thanks for being my guardian angels  keep up the great work! love pam :)
We saw the digital animation movie first, and my son watches the DVD over-and-over.  So, we had to get this series.  He loves it!
